name: Lightseekers
description: Epic battles await you in the multi-award winning Trading Card Game, now on Steam. Battle with digital cards and scan tabletop cards into your digital collection for Double the Value!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1+ (64-bit only) Processor: 64-bit Processor with SSE2 support Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
